attributes.action: Ask Mark Thompson, director general of the BBC to broadcast the Gaza appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands are suffering in Gaza with no food, water or shelter and medical supplies. Humanitarian aid is about helping the inocent victims of a conflict, the children, the mothers, the inocent familys who now live amongst the rubble they still call home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
